quest.name: Hippo Scrub
journal:
Maru has hippos that need pampering.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Use hippo soap on the wading hippo.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Look what I've got, Forename─soap nuts! The folks at Palaka's Stand sent them over, so I made some hippo soap.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Palaka's Stand sent over more soap nuts, so you know what that means─more hippo soap!

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Our hippos are bathin' down at the Great Work as we speak... You think you could run this to the caretaker for me?

dialogue.name: HIPPO04566
dialogue.text: Pohhhhhh...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: This hippo is peacefully wading in the clear, clean water.

dialogue.name: DELIVERER04566
dialogue.text: Hallo, Forename! Come to take a dip?

dialogue.name: DELIVERER04566
dialogue.text: Oh, you brought soap! That's awfully kind of you. Our hippos love gettin' lathered.

dialogue.name: DELIVERER04566
dialogue.text: Say, care to give it a try? It isn't hard─just use that soap and start scrubbin'!

dialogue.name: DELIVERER04566
dialogue.text: Yes, that soap! Don't be shy─lather it on!

dialogue.name: HIPPO04566
dialogue.text: Poh, pooohhhhhh!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The hippo's eyes crinkle with delight as you lather it up with soap.

dialogue.name: DELIVERER04566
dialogue.text: All soaped up? Now, roll up those sleeves and get to scrubbin'!

dialogue.name: HIPPO04566
dialogue.text: Poh, poooooohhh! Poh, poh, bhurrrrrr...

dialogue.name: DELIVERER04566
dialogue.text: Hahaha, that's it! Just look at her─well pleased indeed!

dialogue.name: DELIVERER04566
dialogue.text: Keepin' our hippos relaxed an' happy is an important part of the job. We aren't Riders without our hippos, after all! Thanks for the soap─tell Maru we'll be along soon.

dialogue.name: DELIVERER04566
dialogue.text: Doesn't she look like happiness itself? I'll let her enjoy the water a little longer before headin' back.

dialogue.name: HIPPO04566
dialogue.text: Poooooohhhhhhhhh!

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: Did the hippos like their soap?

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: I'm glad... I like usin' soap nuts 'cause they clean real well without irritatin' hippo skin. Hippos sweat differently than we do, so you've gotta be careful not to throw off their natural balance.

dialogue.name: MARU
dialogue.text: We can always wash up here, but lettin' our hippos relax down at the Great Work does wonders for their mood. An' there ain't no sight sweeter than a happy hippo...
